#summary Release Note for LiveAndroid v0.3 - 20090821
#labels liveandroid,v0.3,release

= Introduction =

LiveAndroid v0.3 is here


= Features =

  * OpenDNS added
  * Audio support
    * VirtualBox - Intel 8x0 AC97
    * VMware - Ensoniq AudioPCI 1371/1373
  * SD card support (512M)
  * Ethernet (DHCP)
  * Mouse wheel support
  * High-resolution support (800*600, 1024*768)
  * Apps added
    * Software Directory
    * AndroidVNC
    * PilotLines, Craigs Races, Super Mario
  * more net card driver added
    * Amd PCNET32 PCI
    * Broadcom 440x/47xx
    * CS89x0
    * Intel PRO/100+
    * NE2000/NE1000
    * Realtek RTL-8129/8130/8139


= Tested platforms =

  * Virtual Machine
    * VirtualBox
    * VMware
  * please help us :)

  * LiveCD iso: liveandroidv0.3.iso
